name: Dungeon Survivors (MarinWin)
description:
Dungeon Survivors

This game envisions you as a player inside an hardcore, procedural generated, zelda-like dungeon with combat similar to a souls-like, but with random generated skills to choose from after each level up. 

Development

It's still in an early, but playable stage. First I concentrate on the Gameloop and Combat Gameplay. Then add more and more playable characters (with different traits and perks), enemies, skills and objectives to complete in the dungeons.

Yes, I am thinking about a Multiplayer mode, so you can play with your friends. 

Assets

I am by no means a skilled artist, therefore I am using assets bought from the asset store on itch.io.

Devlog

I think I am going to start a devlog series of the development, as soon as I feel confident to do so. There are some devlogs and articles about my other Developments here: Marin GameDev (marin-gamedev.ghost.io).
